ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( Name ) || ISBLANK( Text(SCC_Customer_Segment__c )) || ISBLANK( Text( SSC_Product_L1__c )) || ISBLANK( Text(SSC_Product_L2__c )) ||ISBLANK( Text(SSC_Case_Category__c )) || ISBLANK( SSC_Case_Description__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer Segment/Product Grouping/Product/Case Category/Deskripsi Case wajib diisi
